readable.title: 3150742439_b8a352e1e0
readable.content: A man in a black hoodie watching a man in a red cap . A man standing on a street with a suitcase in front of him while another man bends down to look at what is displayed on top of it . A man wearing a red hat looks down as another man watches . Two men are standing on the street covered in graffiti . Two people on a street , one person looking down .
